items.sentence: When I said that the airplane wasn't safe, no one listened to me.

I don't think that Tom knows what time Mary woke up this morning.
I don't think that Tom knows what time Mary is planning to leave.
I was busy packing, because I was leaving for France in two days.

More than half of my books were destroyed by the fire last night.
